meanings.definition: A person or company that packages goods for sale or distribution.
meanings.sent1: The packager carefully wrapped each item before sending them out.
meanings.sent2: The packager labeled all the products before they were shipped to stores.
meanings.sent3: The packager accidentally used the wrong box size, causing a comical mix-up.
meanings.sent4: She was a packager of happiness, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The packager's attention to detail made the products stand out on the shelves.

meanings.definition: A software program that bundles multiple files or resources into a single file for distribution.
meanings.sent1: The packager combined all the images into a single file for easy sharing.
meanings.sent2: I used a packager to compress the files before sending them via email.
meanings.sent3: The packager program decided to take a break right before an important deadline.
meanings.sent4: The packager was like a magician, turning many files into one seamless package.
meanings.sent5: Using the packager saved me a lot of time when organizing my documents.
